Rectangle Hollow Profile Definition
===================================



```
concept {
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:XDim -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:YDim -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:WallThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:InnerFilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcRectangleHollowProfileDef:OuterFilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
